00024 #include "Sampler.nxc"
00025 #include "LowPassFilter.nxc"
00026 #include "HighPassFilter.nxc"
00027 
00028 #define LIGHT_SENSOR IN_3
00029 #define LIGHT_SENSOR_SAMPLING_PERIOD 36 /* degrees */
00030 #define LIGHT_SENSOR_SAMPLING_RATE   30 /* samples per cycle (1080 degrees) */
00031 
00032 task
00033 main ()
00034 {
00035     int t = 0;
00036     int x1 = 0, x2 = 0;
00037     int max = 0;
00038     SamplerContext sampler;
00039     HighPassFilterContext highPass;
00040     LowPassFilterContext lowPass;
00041 
00042     SetSensorLight(LIGHT_SENSOR);
00043     ClearScreen();
00044     ResetAllTachoCounts(OUT_B);
00045     SamplerInit(sampler, 0, LIGHT_SENSOR_SAMPLING_PERIOD);
00046     HighPassFilterInit(highPass, 3 /* 0.5Hz * 2 * PI */, LIGHT_SENSOR_SAMPLING_RATE);
00047     LowPassFilterInit(lowPass, 24 /* 4Hz * 2 * PI */, LIGHT_SENSOR_SAMPLING_RATE);
00048 
00049     OnFwd(OUT_B, 100);
00050     while (1)
00051     {
00052         int tachoCount = GetOutput(OUT_B, TachoCount);
00053         int lightSense = Sensor(LIGHT_SENSOR);
00054 
00055         do {
00056             int lightSenseSample = SamplerGet(sampler, tachoCount, lightSense);
00057             if (lightSenseSample < 0)
00058                 break;
00059             int highPassOut = HighPassFilter(highPass, lightSenseSample);
00060             int lowPassOut = LowPassFilter(lowPass, highPassOut);
00061 
00062             /* Plot both intput and output samplings */
00063             //LineOut(t, 48, t, 48 + lightSense - 50, false);
00064             LineOut(t,  16, t, 16 + lowPassOut, false);
00065             t++;
00066             if (t >= 60)
00067             {
00068                ClearScreen();
00069                t = 0;
00070             }
00071         } while (sampler.hasMore);
00072     }
00073 }
00074
